plugin.description: A plugin that enhances the frontal blindspot view with animated camera movements in Euro Truck Simulator 2 and American Truck Simulator.

settings.target_camera.position.x.title: Target Position X
settings.target_camera.position.x.desc: Left/Right position offset relative to the seat.
settings.target_camera.position.y.title: Target Position Y
settings.target_camera.position.y.desc: Up/Down position offset relative to the seat.
settings.target_camera.position.z.title: Target Position Z
settings.target_camera.position.z.desc: Forward/Backward position offset relative to the seat.
settings.target_camera.rotation.yaw.title: Target Rotation Yaw
settings.target_camera.rotation.pitch.title: Target Rotation Pitch
settings.target_camera.fov.title: Target Field of View (FOV)
settings.target_camera.fov.desc: The camera's Field of View when peeking.
settings.animation.speed.title: Animation Speed
settings.animation.speed.desc: How fast the camera moves to the target position.
settings.animation.type.title: Animation Type
settings.animation.type.desc: The style of camera animation. 'Linear' is a direct path. 'Live' simulates head movement.
settings.groups.target_camera.title: Target Camera Settings
settings.groups.target_camera.desc: Parameters for the camera's final position and orientation when peeking.
settings.groups.animation.title: Animation Settings
settings.groups.target_camera.position.title: Position
settings.groups.target_camera.position.desc: Position offset relative to the seat.
settings.groups.target_camera.rotation.title: Rotation
settings.groups.target_camera.rotation.desc: Rotation offset relative to the seat.

keybinds.toggle.title: Toggle Peek View
keybinds.toggle.desc: Press to peek forward and see the blindspot. Press again to return.
